settings.title: Get to know the best duffels for travel.
settings.text: While we can't pick favorites, each one of our CALPAK duffels shines in its own unique way—see how below.

settings.title: Luka Duffel
settings.description:
Our Luka lightweight duffel bag is designed to make moves and has endless possibilities. With 9 separate pockets, and 1 shoe compartment, you can use it as a gym bag, a diaper bag, or wear it to the airport or the office. The best part of this puffy duffel bag? It features a tucked away passport pocket on the inside of the trolley sleeve, and fits nearly under most plane seats. You’re welcome. 

Features

Exterior Pockets: 4
Interior Pockets: 5
Fits On A Plane: Under the seat
Dimensions: 16" x 12" x 7"
Materials: Scratch-resistant polyester
Extra Perk: Hidden pocket in trolley sleeve
Padded Laptop Sleeve: No
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: Yes

settings.title: Luka Large Duffel
settings.description:
The bigger sister to our Luka Duffel—this large version was designed as a lightweight solution for those who like to carry-on just a little bit extra (we're looking at you, overpackers). Created for extended weekends away, you can fit all you need into this gleefully spacious holdall that features 9 pockets and an interior shoe compartment. Plus, it fits perfectly in all overhead bins. More space, no stress.

Features

Exterior Pockets:4
Interior Pockets: 5
Fits On A Plane: Overhead Bin
Dimensions: 19" x 15.5" x 9.5"
Materials: Scratch-resistant polyester
Extra Perk: Hidden pocket in trolley sleeve
Padded Laptop Sleeve: No
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: Yes

settings.title: Terra Backpack Duffel
settings.description:
This water-resistant duffel backpack, made from 27 recycled plastic bottles, offers you the best of both worlds: it converts from a backpack to duffel, and back again, and features padded shoulder and sternum straps for extra comfort. In addition to multiple pockets and an interior compression strap, this travel duffel backpack has a 17” padded laptop compartment so you can take your work with you (if you absolutely insist.) 

Features

Exterior Pockets: 8
Interior Pockets: 10
Fits On A Plane: Under the seat
Dimensions: 18" x 12" x 7.5"
Materials: 100% Recycled ripstop polyester with TPU laminate/coating
Extra Perk: Dual-Purpose Functionality
Padded Laptop Sleeve: Yes
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: Yes

settings.title: Compakt Duffel Bag
settings.description:
Meet the ultra-lightweight, nylon duffel bag that’s foldable and perfect for quick trips out of town or to the gym. This packable duffel bag is large enough to fit all the souvenirs from your travels, and flexible enough to break down and store away discreetly inside its own zippered pouch. Made from durable ripstop nylon, and featuring its own luggage sleeve—this is the perfect over-the-shoulder travel duffel bag to go away with. 

Features

Exterior Pockets: 4
Interior Pockets: 0
Fits On A Plane: Under the seat
Dimensions: 18" x 12" x 8"
Materials: Water-resistant durable ripstop nylon
Extra Perk: Folds into a zippered pocket for compact storage
Padded Laptop Sleeve: No
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: Yes

settings.title: Stevyn Duffel
settings.description:
Looking for weekend duffel bags? This duffel bag with shoe compartment truly can fit everything you need, and much more. With its sleek, unisex design, this sturdy duffel bag is perfect for overnight trips, sessions in the gym, or as a carry-on; especially since it features a luggage sleeve, a roomy main compartment with multiple interior pockets and a separate compartment for multiple pairs of shoes.

Features

Exterior Pockets: 1
Interior Pockets: 4
Fits On A Plane: Overhead bin
Dimensions: 19.5" x 14" x 10.5"
Materials: Durable polyester with nylon straps
Extra Perk: Separate shoe compartment
Padded Laptop Sleeve: No
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: Yes

settings.title: Hue Laptop Duffel
settings.description:
Made from this buttery-soft vegan leather, our Hue minimalist duffel bag is the perfect bag for those who take a ‘less is more’ approach to travel. With a 15" padded laptop sleeve, a removable accessory pocket, and a secret smartphone pouch, plus plenty of pockets to keep you organized—this duffel wins our vote for best business travel duffel bag, perfect for days in the office (with a trip to the gym before) or work trips.

Features

Exterior Pockets: 2
Interior Pockets: 4
Fits On A Plane: Under the seat
Dimensions: 18" x 10" x 9.5"
Materials: Buttery-soft vegan leather
Extra Perk: Removable accessory pocket
Padded Laptop Sleeve: Yes
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: Yes

settings.title: Stevyn Rolling Duffel
settings.description:
Our best-selling rolling duffel bag, Stevyn, just got wheels—making it the largest, and easiest to carry, duffel bag in our selection. With this wheeling duffel bag’s large bottom compartment, perfect for shoes or storing cosmetic bags, you can pack and carry more than ever and still fit it in the overhead bin.

Features

Exterior Pockets: 2
Interior Pockets: 4
Fits On A Plane: Most overhead bins
Dimensions: 22” x 13” x 10.5”
Materials: Durable polyester
Extra Perk: Rolling wheels for easy travel
Padded Laptop Sleeve: No
Trolley Sleeve: Yes
Removable Shoulder Strap: No

settings.title: Toiletry Bags
settings.description: Bring your glow on-the-go and find the best toiletry bag for traveling.

settings.title: Packing Cubes
settings.description: Packing cubes are the #1 tool for travel organization—  they make your journeys more enjoyable.
